Title: Establishes an office of the state medical fund ombudsperson and a medical indemnity fund advisory panel
Summary: Establishes an office of the state medical indemnity fund ombudsperson and a medical indemnity fund advisory panel to advocate for, assist and represent the interests of qualified plaintiffs.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to establishing an office of the state medical indemnity fund ombudsperson and a medical indemnity fund advisory panel
